nodes.bodyText:
why SignStyle.NEVER?
I guess we could try with NORMAL (this is default)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -466,7 +466,7 @@
 
     private static final DateTimeFormatter STRICT_BASIC_WEEK_DATE_PRINTER = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder()
         .parseStrict()
-        .appendValue(IsoFields.WEEK_BASED_YEAR, 4)
+        .appendValue(IsoFields.WEEK_BASED_YEAR, 4, 10, SignStyle.NEVER)

nodes.bodyText: Sure, I think I took this from elsewhere but NORMAL sounds right to me.

nodes.bodyText:
I think we should have a separate BASIC_YEAR_MONTH_DAY_PRINTER
FORMATTER is a bit unfortunate name to be fair, as it is used for parsing..
